sentences.en: a flat roof
sentences.cn: 平顶

sentences.en: a pitched roof
sentences.cn: 斜顶

sentences.en: Angry tenants finally raised the roof about their noisy neighbors.
sentences.cn: 愤怒的房客终于对吵闹喧哗的邻居提出强烈抗议

sentences.en: Armstrong drove the ball into the roof of the net.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗将球打入球门网顶。

sentences.en: Goldsmith has repaired the roof to ensure the house is wind-proof.
sentences.cn: 戈德史密斯修理了屋顶，以确保房屋能够抗风。

sentences.en: He directed the tiny beam of light at the roof.
sentences.cn: 他把那一小束光对准了屋顶。

sentences.en: I am just thankful that we have a roof over our heads.
sentences.cn: 我们有地方住我就很感激了。

sentences.en: It has a dormer roof joining both gable ends.
sentences.cn: 带天窗的斜屋顶连接着两边的山墙。

sentences.en: Last night some of the prisoners appeared on the roof.
sentences.cn: 昨晚，其中几个犯人出现在房顶上。

sentences.en: Mills have iron pillars all over the place holding up the roof.
sentences.cn: 工厂里四处都立有铁柱支撑着房顶。

sentences.en: One prisoner was still holding out on the roof of the jail.
sentences.cn: 一名犯人仍在监狱的房顶上顽抗。

sentences.en: Operating costs went through the roof last year.
sentences.cn: 去年的手术费用已涨到登峰造极的程度

sentences.en: Prices for Korean art have gone through the roof.
sentences.cn: 韩国艺术品的价格飞涨。

sentences.en: She clicked her tongue against the roof of her mouth.
sentences.cn: 她用舌头顶着上腭发出啧啧声。

sentences.en: Single room in lovely flat, roof terrace, non-smoking prof., woman pref.
sentences.cn: 舒适公寓中的单间，带屋顶阳台，不抽烟的职业人士，女士优先。

sentences.en: Strapping the skis on the roof, we boarded the hovercraft in Dover.
sentences.cn: 用带子把滑水板绑在船顶后，我们就在多佛登上了气垫船。

sentences.en: The air was fresh, courtesy of three holes in the roof.
sentences.cn: 房顶有3个洞，所以空气很清新。

sentences.en: The participants plan to dance, drink, and generally raise the roof at tonight's party.
sentences.cn: 参与者们计划在今晚的聚会上跳舞、饮酒及总之是极尽喧闹之能事

sentences.en: There is a wide veranda under the overhang of the roof.
sentences.cn: 悬吊的屋顶下是一条宽阔的游廊。

sentences.en: They finally found the cat up on the roof.
sentences.cn: 他们最后在屋顶上找到了那只猫。

sentences.en: Water tanks should be well lagged and the roof well insulated.
sentences.cn: 水箱和屋顶都需要敷设严密的保温层。

sentences.en: When I told her about breaking the window, she went through the roof.
sentences.cn: 她听我说有关砸碎窗户的事时大发雷霆

words.tran_cn: 客人对主人道谢的函；盖屋顶的人
给…覆以屋顶（roof的过去式及过去分词形式）

phrases.phrase: go through the roof informal 非正式

phrases.tran_cn: 屋顶构造，屋盖构造；屋顶结构
屋架；屋顶架；支持屋顶的三角形桁架
世界屋脊（喜马拉雅山的别称）

trans.tran_en: the structure that covers or forms the top of a building, vehicle, tent etc
to put a roof on a building
